body: No I'm not getting unmotivated to make videos. I want to pump out as many as I can. It's just rather frustrating trying to play nebula games with every map you don't like. Literally I have a problem with every new map for one tiny reason, or a lot of major ones. I'm going to keep trying, but its really hard sneezing while defending and then losing the monument because of an Efficiency V pickaxe.

title: The Reason for the lack of videos

replies.body: Yep I dont like the new maps too, they are very laggy, lack of gameplay and too much visual information to process, you pay more attention to the loads of random blocks when it was supposed to pay attention to the game.
